entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as a powerful wizard who has never accepted the possibility of death.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, described as having courage and accepting the possibility of death.

entities.name: lucius
entities.description: A wizard who is associated with Voldemort, but not a main character in this context.

entities.name: voldemort's wand
entities.description: Voldemort's wand, described as powerful and containing some of Voldemort's qualities.

entities.name: harry's wand
entities.description: Harry's wand, described as having imbibed some of the power and qualities of Voldemort's wand.

entities.name: lucius's wand
entities.description: Lucius's wand, described as not being able to perform powerful magic compared to Harry's wand.

relationships.description: Harry's wand imbibed some of the power and qualities of Voldemort's wand that night.
Your wand now contained the power of your enormous courage and of Voldemortâ€™s own deadly skill, making it more powerful than Lucius's wand.
Your wand recognized him when he pursued you, recognized a man who was both kin and mortal enemy.
